ActFederal Courts Act
Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisRULES AMENDING CERTAIN RULES GOVERNING PRACTICE AND PROCEDURE APPLICABLE TO THE FEDERAL COURTS (REPRESENTATIVE PROCEEDINGS, CLASS PROCEEDINGS AND OTHER AMENDMENTS) by, inter alia, reinstating Rule 114 (Representative Proceedings in the Federal Court) and by introducing comprehensive Class Proceedings Rules.
